content.p: Elisabetta Ferraro is a dual-qualified Italian Lawyer and UK Trade Mark Attorney. She currently works as IP Expert in the Legal affairs Department at the EUIPO, where she focuses on designs. Before joining the Office, Elisabetta spent nearly 10 years in leading European Law Firms. Join us for an exciting career talk, where you will have the chance to ask Elisabetta practical questions and hear real-world experiences that could benefit your professional journey. Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to learn, connect and take the next step in your career. All welcome to attend. email: unclc@nottingham.ac.uk
